narrative.intro: Tu nave ha sufrido un fallo catastrófico. Varada en un cinturón de asteroides, necesitas recursos para repararla. Los acreedores galácticos están dispuestos a ayudar... por un precio.
narrative.zorvax_greeting: Banco Zorvax aquí. Vemos que necesitas fondos. Nuestras tasas son razonables... por ahora.
narrative.ktar_greeting: Los K'tar no pierden el tiempo. Necesitas créditos, los tenemos. Pero NO nos hagas esperar el pago.
narrative.nebula_greeting: El Consorcio Nebulosa te da la bienvenida. Somos flexibles, generosos incluso. Pero recuerda: todo tiene su precio.
narrative.friendly_greeting: ¿Necesitas ayuda, viejo amigo? Puedo prestarte algo, sin muchas condiciones. Pero solo esta vez.
narrative.victory: ¡Lo lograste! La nave está reparada y lista para despegar. Ahora solo espero que puedas pagar tus deudas...
narrative.game_over_oxygen: El oxígeno se ha agotado. Tu aventura termina aquí.
narrative.game_over_debt: Tus acreedores han perdido la paciencia. No hay escapatoria de tus deudas.

mining.title: Minería de Asteroides
mining.instructions: Haz clic en las vetas de mineral en el momento correcto para extraer recursos.

dodge.title: Esquivar Escombros
dodge.instructions: Usa las flechas o WASD para esquivar asteroides y recolectar recursos.

wiring.title: Reparación de Circuitos
wiring.instructions: Conecta los cables del color correcto a sus puntos correspondientes.

timing.title: Calibración de Sistemas
timing.instructions: Presiona las teclas de dirección en el momento exacto para calibrar los sistemas.

narrative.intro: Your ship has suffered a catastrophic failure. Stranded in an asteroid belt, you need resources to repair it. Galactic creditors are willing to help... for a price.
narrative.zorvax_greeting: Zorvax Bank here. We see you need funds. Our rates are reasonable... for now.
narrative.ktar_greeting: The K'tar don't waste time. You need credits, we have them. But DON'T make us wait for payment.
narrative.nebula_greeting: The Nebula Consortium welcomes you. We are flexible, even generous. But remember: everything has its price.
narrative.friendly_greeting: Need help, old friend? I can lend you something, not many strings attached. But only this once.
narrative.victory: You did it! The ship is repaired and ready to launch. Now I just hope you can pay your debts...
narrative.game_over_oxygen: The oxygen has run out. Your adventure ends here.
narrative.game_over_debt: Your creditors have lost patience. There's no escape from your debts.

mining.title: Asteroid Mining
mining.instructions: Click on the ore veins at the right moment to extract resources.

dodge.title: Dodge Debris
dodge.instructions: Use arrows or WASD to dodge asteroids and collect resources.

wiring.title: Circuit Repair
wiring.instructions: Connect the wires of the correct color to their corresponding points.

timing.title: System Calibration
timing.instructions: Press the arrow keys at the exact moment to calibrate the systems.
